interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.23 Natural Beige)
Review Date: 2021/09/30
Store: UNNY CLUB
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 3.03 x 1.06 inches; 0.39 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a concealer in a cushion powder form. It comes in a compact with a magnetic closure and included sponge. It only comes in 2 colors: light beige and natural beige. I got the natural beige which is still on the lighter side and is best for fair to light complexions. This provides good coverage and blends easily. It applies like a liquid but dries like a powder.
Review Title: Natural beige is still pretty light
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Glass Spray Bottles 16oz Refillable Container suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants (2 Pack，Blue) RONGCHUANG {'Brand': 'RONGCHUANG', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.36 Pounds', 'UPC': '768253664713'} I got these to replace a bottle of cleaning solution that no longer worked. These bottles are made of glass so they are much sturdier than the typical plastic bottles. The blue glass also looks more "elegant" on a countertop if you plan to display it. There are 2 spray settings (fine mist and stream). I didn't have any issues with leaking. It comes with 2 16 oz bottles, 4 labels, 2 caps, and a funnel (not pictured because I somehow misplaced it already). Looks nice on the counter GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 GERSHION {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} This is a great set of 6 bright, pastel colored gel polishes. Each bottle has a sticker on top to mark the color, which is 100% accurate. The polish is on the thicker side so you only need 1-2 coats for opacity. These will be my go to all summer long! Beautiful pastel colors! MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack MISS SPA {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} This combo set comes with 3 different “spa” treats: a set of eye patches, feet masks and lip mask. It has a you need to pamper you’re self from head to toe. Here are my 2 cents on each:

Lip mask - it’s big and easily for around my entire mouth. Felt nice and moisturizing on my lips. Leaves you unable to talk for at least 20 min

Feet mask - smells like eucalyptus… nice and cooling on my feet… there are tabs on the side to hold them in place. Feet felt so soft and moisturized after removal. There was no dry spot in sight. I rubbed the rest of the serum all over my legs.

Eye patch - cool and soothing on my face… stays in place even with me moving around freely. Nice combo set Tirtyl Hand Soap Sheet Variety Pack - 240 Pack with Portable Storage Tin - Camping/Outdoor/Travel/Handbag - Lavender & Aloe - Bergamot & Ylang Ylang - Jasmine & Patchouli Tirtyl {'Brand': 'Tirtyl', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender,Jasmine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '240.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 6.26 x 0.75 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} This set contains 3 packs of soap sheets with the following scents/fragrances: Lavender & Aloe, Bergamot & Ylang Ylang, Jasmine & Patchouli. There are 80 sheets in each pack. The sheets are thin and dissolve easily with water. It provides a good amount of lather and smells wonderful. I used the Jasmine & Patchouli scent today and it's pretty long lasting. My hands felt clean, soft, and moisturized afterwards. This set comes with a storage tin so it's perfect for traveling or camping. Dissolves easily, smells great, and provides a good lather.... [ 2 Pack] Eyebrow Pencil -Makeup Brow Stylist Definer Longlasting Waterproof Brow Pencil with Spoolie Brush, Shaper and Filler Auto Pencil For Women - All Hair Colors & Skin Tones (A-Brown) SZFLWA {'Brand': 'SZFLWA', 'Item Form': 'Gel,Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.79 x 0.2 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '765835047612'} This is a pack of 2 mechanical brow liners in the color brown. These are dual ended pencils so one end has a brow brush while the other end has the eyebrow product. The pencils have a beautiful gold casing that is slim and comfortable to grasp. I think the formula is a little dry so I had to apply some pressure for the desired color payout. The fine tip allows you to draw in precise brow hairs. The staying power is great and held up well throughout my 8+ hour work day. I wanted to test out the waterproof claim so I did shower without washing my face and the color didn't really budge if left untouched. It came off easily using a makeup wipe. Requires some effort for application but stays on pretty well..... UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.23 Natural Beige) UNNY CLUB {'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 3.03 x 1.06 inches; 0.39 Ounces'} This is a concealer in a cushion powder form. It comes in a compact with a magnetic closure and included sponge. It only comes in 2 colors: light beige and natural beige. I got the natural beige which is still on the lighter side and is best for fair to light complexions. This provides good coverage and blends easily. It applies like a liquid but dries like a powder. Natural beige is still pretty light
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong preference for durable glass containers and multifunctional skincare products, increasingly gravitating towards cosmetics that offer both convenience and quality. Their recent purchase indicates a focus on effective makeup solutions, particularly those suitable for their skin tone and providing good coverage.

- **Style & Aesthetics:** The appreciation for stylish items enhancing home decor and self-care routines remains intact. The user’s selection in cosmetics reflects an ongoing commitment to elegance and practicality, favoring designs that integrate well into their beauty regimen.

- **Practicality:** Versatility in cosmetics is a growing priority, especially products that complement an on-the-go lifestyle while retaining aesthetic appeal. The user looks for solutions that blend functionality with ease of use.

- **Quality Consciousness:** The user emphasizes durable, non-toxic materials and effective makeup options that ensure long-lasting wear. Their preferences align with sustainable product choices and a commitment to quality.

- **Organizational Traits:** The desire for organized and neatly labeled products extends to cosmetics, highlighting a need for accessible and functional solutions that remain visually appealing.

- **User Experience:** Prioritizing a seamless experience in personal care and makeup application, the user is open to makeup that may involve more effort while delivering excellent performance.

Overall, the user focuses on high-quality, stylish, and practical products that enhance their self-care and makeup routines, balancing aesthetics with everyday convenience.
